name: Mirch Gosht Recipe | Masala TV
ingredients: Ingredients for Mirch Gosht Recipe: Mutton ½ kg Green chilies ½ kg Crushed black pepper 1 tsp Ginger Garlic 1 tsp Turmeric ½ tsp Lemons Raw onion paste 3 Salt to taste Curry leaves few Roasted cumin powder ½ tbsp Oil 1 cup
instructions: Take 1 cup oil in the pan and add in raw onion paste and fry it till golden brown. Now add in ½ kg mutton, salt, 1 tsp ginger garlic paste and 1/2tsp turmeric. When the water of meat dries, simmer it and add in 1- 1 ½ cup hot water. Cook till the meat tenders. Separately fry green chilies in the frying pan. When the water of the meat dries, add in green chilies, 1 tsp crushed black pepper Add ½ tbsp roasted cumin powder, lemon juice and curry leaves. Simmer it and serve it with plain rice.
